metadata.Title: CVE-2021-3498 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
GStreamer before 1.18.4 might cause heap corruption when parsing certainmalformed Matroska files.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-3498` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

gstreamer1.0-gtk3 - 1.14.5-0ubuntu1~18.04.2
gstreamer1.0-plugins-good - 1.14.5-0ubuntu1~18.04.2
gstreamer1.0-pulseaudio - 1.14.5-0ubuntu1~18.04.2
gstreamer1.0-qt5 - 1.14.5-0ubuntu1~18.04.2
libgstreamer-plugins-good1.0-0 - 1.14.5-0ubuntu1~18.04.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: gst-plugins-good1.0 package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.14.5-0ubuntu1~18.04.2').
